titles.title: A bill to extend the existing temporary suspension of duty on fusilade.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2429)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1993, the suspension of duty on butyl 2-(4-(5-trifluoromethyl-2-pyridinyloxy)-phenoxy) propanoate (fusilade) (a pesticide).
